html:
12.19.19  2:58 pm   Help I woke up in the morning and now I'm travelling straight into the sun what should I do?

     try to act naturally

12.19.19  2:49 pm   why do i fall in love so easily.

     that's because everyone is so lovable

      how can i stop

     fall in love with everyone, then there will be no one left to fall in love with

12.19.19  2:13 pm   what is my brain's name

     could be brainerd

12.19.19  2:00 pm   How much is too much?

     i'm not sure, but one thing i know is this much is not enough

12.19.19  1:58 pm   Ok but? Waffles or pancakes?

     if you really want the leg room you're gonna need waffles. especially if you have an exorbitantly high number of legs

12.19.19  1:49 pm   Are you a dog or cat person?

     i am a hybrid between all 3. cat/dog/person

12.19.19  1:16 pm   is christmas real

     it has an ongoing special agreement with reality

12.19.19  1:11 pm   could i interest you in some ketchup

     no, i have banished ketchup

12.19.19  1:03 pm   Isn't a hamburger technically a sandwich?

     yes, sometimes 2 sandwiches

12.19.19  12:56 pm   are you a colony

     i am in the process of colonizing myself

12.19.19  12:19 pm   if you could take one picture of something, what would it be ?

     everything

12.19.19  12:02 pm   will you ever do a remake of the song song? i need it

     i would do a re make of every song, which fortunately includes that one

12.19.19  11:57 am   What is the true meaning of Christmas?

     darkness, while being very grateful and thankful that the world is not usually this dark. in the southern hemisphere it takes a bit of reverse psychology to get this

12.19.19  11:55 am   lord god please tell me what your solo synth sound is

     it's just me. i made the sound, and then i play the sound. the sound is made with a lot of options for the player, so the player matters on this one, just as much as the maker. which in this case are both me. i was going to say that i used seahorses, but that's not true, i did not

12.19.19  11:45 am   how on earth do you come up with suck catch songs?

     i check the weather first, which doesn't matter because it always changes anyway. then songs will occur, depending on the changed weather

12.19.19  11:36 am   what do you pour first? milk or cereal?

     first the milk, then a bunch of seahorses, then cereal, for the sea horses to eat

12.19.19  11:22 am   I dislike the saying that "the sky is the limit" because it is clearly not the limit.

     that's true

12.19.19  10:37 am   Sorry to interrupt you Bill, but my couch is currently sitting at a 63 degree angle. Do you know how I can prevent this?

     it doesn't matter now, what's important is how to fix it. you gotta move it back. and to prevent it in the future, you wanna make sure no one else moves it

      Because I can't play Wii Sports like this.

     or maybe you could rotate your house, around the couch

12.19.19  10:26 am   opinion on seahorses??

     the logo for the seahorse is a seahorse

12.19.19  10:23 am   is cereal soup?

     new update out of switzerland this morning, cereal is considered a sandwich

12.19.19  10:07 am   if given the chance to become either a worm or a skeleton, which would you choose?

     don't worms have skeletons? is there any chance i could be a worm skeleton. nevermind, save the offer for another day. i appreciate the opportunity

12.19.19  9:51 am   I had a thought the other day that maybe the reason you prefer singles to albums is your music tends to be self contained in each song (lyrics, story lines, moods etc) rather than flowing into one another. Does that sound accurate or am I projecting onto you?

     i thought all songs were like that

12.19.19  9:50 am   i love your videos! Amazing editing

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.19.19  9:41 am   what is the capital of my body

     i know you would expect it to be your brain but it's actually sacremento

12.19.19  9:39 am   12.19.19  12:04 am ok. fair. one more question then, how do you be yourself and not a fucking idiot? thanks bye.

     sometimes you can use reverse psychology

12.19.19  9:29 am   Just fukin upload a fukin quality video

     i almost did not even think of that

12.19.19  9:27 am   How do u ask a question?

     sometimes you can use reverse psychology

12.19.19  8:33 am   1. Are you making another video?

     i was going to hopefully make all the videos

      If so, do you have a set day that it will release?

     every day would be good, that would seem convenient for everyone, including myself

      2. Microwave?

     was envisioning some larger type of wave

12.19.19  8:20 am   There's a frog living outside my window who wakes me up very early with his horny songs. He's really bugging the heck outta me. What should I say to him? 

     you must interrupt him, with hornier songs, more horny than he may have ever thought possible

12.19.19  6:56 am   Can you do the thing that the thing did when he did the thing while doing the thing?

     doing it now

12.19.19  6:02 am   Can grass talk? 

     it can dream

12.19.19  5:50 am   would you say you are still flicking your car blinker way too hard?

     not hard enough

12.19.19  5:04 am   i was standing in my kitchen feeling overwhelmed with how many amazing inventions there are, how much stuff people have done before us to make everyone's life easier and that's just the kitchen. they were strong and smart and i'm trying to not let the convenience of it all make me weak and dumb. not really a question just extremely grateful and other feelings i can't name

     that's true, but don't forget how much easier all those inventors' lives were made, by all the inventions that came before. now it's your turn

12.19.19  5:00 am   When are you planning to upload videos again?

     every week!

12.19.19  4:42 am   Do you the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the the 

     yes, that is exactly what i do

12.19.19  4:36 am   is water wet?

     it damn better well not be

12.19.19  4:13 am   When writing a song, which is the better principle to stick by: to KISS (Keep It Simple Stupid) or write without limits with the handicap of getting musically overwhelmed because of it? 

     the golden rule is the song wants to surprise you. by switching between being simple and not simple. with neither too much regularity nor irregularity

12.19.19  4:05 am   do you ever wear an item of clothing until it just completely falls apart?

     yes, i have done that

12.19.19  3:53 am   please could you release reality videos weekly

     yes, i will do it

12.19.19  3:05 am   Will you/Have you used the word "lugubrious" in your songs?

     no

12.19.19  2:56 am   What would you say is your biggest inspiration for your creations?

     the entire solar system

12.19.19  2:20 am   How do you write your song lyrics?

     in a musical way. i imagine things sung. that accomplishes 2 things at the same time; it tells me both the lyric and melody

12.19.19  2:12 am   what do you want for christmas

     a potato holder. i have so many potatoes but nothing to hold them

12.19.19  2:00 am   Hey Bill, who are some of your Musical influences?

     pots and pans,

12.19.19  1:44 am   This isn't a question, but I admire and appreciate how genuine you are. It's really inspiring. Thanks for being the person you are

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.19.19  1:35 am   inspirational thoughts please

     *birds flying*

12.19.19  1:27 am   Why did the chicken cross the road?

     it was following another road. going through an intersection with the first road

12.19.19  1:21 am   I know It's kinda pushing it too much, but if you really come to Brazil, can you say hello, how are you?

     i would say hello, and then it's the other person's turn. to say something

12.19.19  12:54 am   name something that bends

     the whole freakin rules

12.19.19  12:04 am   It's weird trying to infer your stance on capitalism. Getting a huge "Christmas kinda sucks" vibe maybe because of capitalism(???)

     it might be your own beliefs that you have projected somehow onto me

      meaning the commodification, propaganda, distribution, and sale of this weird red fat dude, who's a way way way bastardized representation of Jesus,. .  is kinda absurd .. given all the resources and stuff wasted.... just a guess. .  Also Rock and roll Confusion, the video. and the audio journal 'bout "pirates looting booty". It seems like rich people being shitty is a thing you sometimes talk about.

     i have never talked about that. i respect rich people, and their beliefs

      Except for that one time in Movie Star where you empathize with a dude who lives in a cool house. maybe there are others.

but when you were asked before about being anticapitalist or having those views I think you were like "but making money, like...you need to".

     that may be true but i did not say that

      So I guess what I'm asking is/was this something you think about? care to share findings of research on this topic?

     not quite yet, but it sounds very much like you just explained your own beliefs and tried very hard to infer that they are my beliefs too. those are not bad beliefs, they are very good beliefs. but they originated from you as you wrote them
